report_new_issue_desc: Select a category to begin your report. For urgent issues, select Emergency Report.
my_recent_reports_desc: A summary of your most recent submissions.
settings_desc: Manage your account settings and preferences.
profile_desc: This is your public display name and email.
appearance_desc: Customize the look and feel of the application.
theme_desc: Select the color scheme for the app.
email_notifications_desc: Receive email updates on your reported issues.
push_notifications_desc: Get real-time alerts on your device.
help_support_desc: Find answers to common questions and get in touch with our team.
faq_q1: How do I report a new issue?
faq_a1: You can report a new issue from the Dashboard by clicking on one of the categories like 'Garbage' or 'Potholes'. This will take you to a form where you can upload a photo and provide details.
faq_q2: How can I track the status of my report?
faq_a2: Your submitted reports appear on the Dashboard under 'My Recent Reports'. You can click on any report card to view its detailed timeline and current status.
faq_q3: What do the different SLA statuses mean?
faq_a3: SLA (Service Level Agreement) statuses indicate how your report is doing against its target resolution time. 'On Time' is good, 'At Risk' means the deadline is approaching, and 'Deadline Missed' means it's overdue.
